mapper.select: SELECT pm.id_perfil AS id_perfil,pm.id_menu AS id_menu_perfil,pm.orden AS orden, pm.estatus AS estatus_perfil,m.id_menu AS id_menu,m.id_padre AS id_padre, m.menu AS menu, m.descripcion AS descripcion,m.url AS url,m.estatus AS estatus FROM perfil_menu pm INNER JOIN menu m ON m.id_menu = pm.id_menu WHERE pm.id_perfil = #{idPerfil} AND pm.estatus = 'A' AND m.estatus = 'A' ORDER BY id_padre, orden;
